global_attrs.comment: Future projection (2006-2099) forced with prescribed concentration scenario of RCP4.5. The carbon cycle in land and ocean component model is considered, but the time-evolution of CO2 concentration in atmospheric component is prescribed. This ocean model is a Boussinesq model, and the sea level(zos) is obtained from the model results directly. The variable zosga(global average sea level change) is sum of steric effect(zossga) and the model global mean sea level. The reference for zos was taken with respect to the model at the start time of the experiment.
global_attrs.forcing: Nat Ant GHG SD Oz Sl SS Ds BC OC
global_attrs.history: Output from monthly mean data 2011-11-03T13:57:45Z CMOR rewrote data to comply with CF standards and CMIP5 requirements.
global_attrs.source: bcc-csm1-1:atmosphere:  BCC_AGCM2.1 (T42L26); land: BCC_AVIM1.0;ocean: MOM4_L40 (tripolar, 1 lon x (1-1/3) lat, L40);sea ice: SIS (tripolar,1 lon x (1-1/3) lat)
global_attrs.title: bcc-csm1-1 model output prepared for CMIP5 RCP4.5

variable.cell_methods: time: mean area: mean where sea
variable.long_name: Global Average Thermosteric Sea Level Change
